hero.title: AHLOUL BAIT
hero.subtitle: Tidjaniya Community - Ivory Coast
hero.slogan: Uniting hearts, elevating souls, serving the community
hero.description: A non-political religious and social organization, guided by Cheikh Ahmad Tidjani Diabaté. Officially registered in Ivory Coast since 2010, we bring together a spiritual community of 45,000 followers united in peace and solidarity.
hero.unitedCommunity: A community united in faith and mutual support

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: AHLOUL BAIT is committed to serving the community through four fundamental pillars that guide all our actions and initiatives.

spirituality.title: Spirituality
spirituality.description: Cultivate faith and strengthen spiritual connection through the teachings of the Tidjaniya path.

solidarity.title: Solidarity
solidarity.description: Foster community mutual aid and support families in need with compassion.

transmission.title: Transmission
transmission.description: Pass on authentic Islamic values to new generations with wisdom.

peace.title: Peace
peace.description: Promote social peace and intercommunity harmony in our society.

mission.vision: Our vision is to build a strong, united and supportive spiritual community, where each member can grow in faith while contributing to collective well-being.
mission.author: Cheikh Ahmad Tidjani Diabaté
